short_summary: Microbial laboratory services for Enterococcus spp and bovine respiratory disease pathogens
description: The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC), Centre for Foodborne Environmental Zoonotic Infectious Disease (CFEZID), Food-borne Disease and AMR Surveillance Division (FDASD) requires the services of an accredited microbiological laboratory to isolate, identify and test the susceptibility of Enterococcus spp and the bovine respiratory disease pathogens (Histophilus somni, Pasteurella multocida, and Mannheimia haemolytica). The contract will last until March 31st, 2025, with an option for 2 additional years.
